name: You v ouY
description:
This game was developed in 48 hours for the spring 2022 GDA Telephone Jam. 

The theme was "you vs. you."

At first your enemy is just like any other, but then they become all too familiar. ouY learns from your every move, mirroring  your exact move set and abilities from the previous round. When you are your own worst enemy, how long can you stay ahead of the game?

Developed by: 

Anthony Bonet

Andrew Goldstein

Andres Maldonado-Martin

Paolo Montelbano

Michael Tomadakis

Made With Assets by:

Fullstack logo - Alex Bu

Pinata icon - Yazmin Alanis

In-game music - geoffplaysguitar
